name: Hayden Adams
description:
Hayden Adams is the Founder and CEO of Uniswap Labs and inventor of the Uniswap Protocol, the largest decentralized exchange protocol.
He began building in crypto in 2017. As his first project, he set out to build an application that fully embodied the unique properties of Ethereum: decentralized, trustless, permissionless, and secure.
This project eventually became Uniswap. As of April 2024, the Uniswap Protocol has processed over $2 trillion in lifetime volume. Today, Uniswap Labs contributes
